pages.text: $(li)The Tropical Fish is an eatable item that is dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/tropical_fish)Tropical Fish$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/guardian)Guardians$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:bosses/elder_guardian)Elder Guardians$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/fisherman)Fishermans$(/l) may exchange your Tropical Fish by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l)$(br)$(li)They can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/fox)Foxes$(/l).
